results.definition: having momentous consequences; of decisive importance
examples: that fateful meeting of the U.N. when...it declared war on North Korea"- Saturday Rev
the fatal day of the election finally arrived

results.definition: (of events) having extremely unfortunate or dire consequences; bringing ruin
examples: the stock market crashed on Black Friday
the battle was a disastrous end to a disastrous campaign
such doctrines, if true, would be absolutely fatal to my theory"- Charles Darwin
it is fatal to enter any war without the will to win it"- Douglas MacArthur

results.definition: controlled or decreed by fate; predetermined
